channel.title: Best, most popular, and latest RSPS Client?
channel.description: What is the best RSPS Client? The newest UI, most maps, most sources/items, and is regularly updated and is popularly downloaded and highly recommended? Thanks!

item.description:

jacob42:

Again NOT what I am asking, out of ALL the ones of the forum, what one is the best (link me plz anyone)

Let me phrase this as nicely as possible. It’s all about personal preference. Go look around in the downloads section and see what you like.

item.title: Best, most popular, and latest RSPS Client?
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

[quote=“jacob42, post:6, topic:539982”]The point of this thread is for me to target the best one (most items, newest sources/UI, most commands, somewhat new and updated decently often, etc.)

Out of all the RSPS Clients on the forums, what will the majority of you recommend/use?

And not the ones hosted on the site, the clients you can download to make your OWN. (I have one but need the best one.)[/quote]There is no single best one unless if you feel like deobfuscating Jagex’s and using that. You’re better off finding a blank server of a revision you understand so that you can effectively utilize it. I would go with a 600+ since you seem to want modern content. Don’t think you can keep up with the protocol though (as Jagex does), I’d say it’s pointless.

Read full topic
item.source: Best, most popular, and latest RSPS Client?

And not the ones hosted on the site, the clients you can download to make your OWN. (I have one but need the best one.)
